thread.section_title: Bikes2udirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bikes2udirect | www.bikes2udirect.com
thread.title: Woodys Childminding

author: Woodys Childminding
title: Woodys Childminding
text: Bought a bike after xmas 2016. Bike is brilliant just what I wanted and very good value for money. Fast delivery service. Unfortunately saddle was slightly damaged. Contacted customer Service who were brilliant and sent out a new seat which I received within 2 days. Khristine was brilliant and I would definitely recommend Bikes2udirect to anyone.
